body.name: Arteck 2.4G Wireless Mouse with Nano USB Receiver Ergonomic Right Hand Silent Clicking with Backward & Forward for Computer/Desktop/PC/Laptop and Windows 10/8/7 Build in Rechargeable Battery
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 3 mins
features: Easy Setup: Simply insert the nano USB receiver (stored inside at the back of the mouse) into your computer and use the mouse instantly.

6 Buttons for more Productive: Besides the right button, left button and the wheel, the mouse has a DPI button to switch the cursor DPI between 800 / 1200 / 1600 / 2000 / 2400 DPI. The mouse has 2 side-buttons for page backward and forward.
Long Life Rechargeable Battery: Rechargeable lithium battery with an industry-high capacity lasts for 4 months with single charge (based on 2 hours¡¯ non-stop use per day).
Silent Clicking: Work in the office, home, cafe, library without disturbing anyone around you. Ergonomic right hand mouse reduce stress and use more comfortably.
What You Get: Arteck MW360 Wireless Mouse, one nano USB receiver (stored in the back of the mouse), USB-C charging cable, welcome guide, our 24-months warranty and friendly customer service.

productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 53 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy Setup and Use Just simply insert the nano USB receiver (stored in the back of the mouse) into your computer like desktop or laptop, then the mouse can be used instantly. No need driver. The mouse will work up to 33 feet or 10 meters. Ergonomic Design Ergonomic right hand mouse reduce the stress with comfortable use. The mouse DPI switch allows you to change the speed of moving cursor between 800 / 1200 / 1600 / 2000 / 2400 DPI. Productive Design The mouse has 2 side buttons. The side buttons are for page backward and forward, which make you work with the mouse more productive. Comfortable, quiet clicking The whisper-quiet buttons bring a whole new level of comfort to your fingertips. You won't disturb anyone around you any more when you are in the office, home, cafe or library. Rechargeable Battery Built-in industry-high rechargeable Li-polymer battery provides 4-months use on a single charge. (based on 2 hours' non-stop use per day)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use & very comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: The ARTECK mouse is very comfortable and easy to use. It slids along the table & mousepad really smoothly & well. Enjoyable to use.Thanks!Steve

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with my laptop
reviews.reviewText: Works well with my laptop, and feels like it is engineered to my hand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good product but it has a slight problem on the wheel, it tends to stick. You have to give it a little tap to loosen it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than my last mouse
reviews.reviewText: This is my 4th or 5th wireless mouse. I like the Arteck the best. Comfortable fit ( I have an average size hand) the controls are in natural locations, so they are easy too use. I like the fact this mouse is rechargeable using a standard USB c connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Very comfortable and it even turns itself off! Would highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars glides very smoothly
reviews.reviewText: very nice mouse. works as it should, back button is a little small, and it takes a little to remember to push the button to wake, not just move the mouse, but a good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have an Arteck keyboard and love it and wanted to try their mouse. It also works perfectly.I use the keyboard when traveling with my laptop and had previously had to take my Logitech M705 mouse. The problem with doing this is that I then have to take two receiver units. With the Arteck mouse, I can just take their USB receiver.The Arteck mouse works just as well as the Logitech one does in every respect, for a fraction of the price.I'm very pleased with my purchase and so far, the two Arteck products I've purchased have more than met my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little wireless mouse!
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this mouse! It feels very sturdy and well made. The click is really nice, soft, and satisfying. The wheel is smooth, not clicky, which I like. There's no lag. The battery lasts forever - I accidentally left it on all weekend and Monday morning it was working fine. I generally use the main buttons, but the side buttons are perfectly placed for my thumb and have a nice click. I'm a woman with average-sized hands, and the mouse as a whole is ergonomic and fits comfortably in my hand.My only complaint is that, if the USB is plugged in, the track pad on my laptop is automatically disabled. It's kind of annoying, because sometimes when I'm on the go I would like to leave the USB plugged in but not use the mouse. I've been poking around in my settings but can't figure out how to change it, and my previous wireless mouses (mice?) didn't do that.But overall, really happy with this mouse. I haven't had it for long so can't yet speak to its longevity, will update if it dies quickly or something, but I don't expect that as it feels well made.
